title: Avoiding my question?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I have been waiting close to 4 days to get a response on my ticket only to see that it has been last active 3 hours ago? I know tickets get answered from oldest to newest so that means my time has been reset....

replies.body:
I took a look at your ticket and it looks like it was answered today. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Well I have a question about the punishment system, and because it's a simple question I don't want to wait another 3 days for a ticket, I have been suspended for 14 days. The next punishment is a permanent suspension. Does that mean that in 3 months if I have a bad game and become toxic i will still be permanently suspended, or does the ladder fade and reset?
Just stop being toxic from now on and you're fine.

Sorry, I have to post here since your other discussion was removed for some reason?

To be honest, you weren't permabanned for the chat you posted, you were permabanned for everything leading up to the chat you posted with that being the final straw after many warnings.  You can always e-mail player support about it, but I doubt the verdict will change since the ban wasn't out of nowhere.

We don't disclose the amount of time or games it takes to decay the punishment track, as it could promote unsportsmanlike behavior to skirt the systems. I recommend reviewing the information that the behavior specialist has provided you and write them back if you have any further questions.
